page.title: 09Riot at the Swan Inn Nordley
page.content:
A Broseley{Morris Dance Group}called {The Ironmen and Severn Gilders,}went to the{Swan Inn Nordley,}on the 7th of June,{smashed}up furniture,{insulted the Landlord and customers,{blackened their faces, got{drunk}and left {without}paying.
But it was only a{re-enactment}of a {real}event which happened at the Inn in{1652.
The Iron Men wear{black}clogs,{red socks,{black}breeches,{red}shirts,{red and{black}tatter-jackets and{black bowler hats.They{black}their faces and {musicians}play{instruments}like the snare drum, melodion and fiddle, to {accompany}the dancers.
They hope to make this an{annual event.
